type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Shapeshifter Noble
rules_text:
[i]Nobility[/i] – Whenever Kana, Dragon Princess or another Noble you control enters, create a tapped Treasure token.
[i]Draconic Hex[/i] – Whenever Kana attacks, target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of artifact tokens you control.
